item.title: Anna Wintour Reveals Thoughts on Meryl Streep’s Character in ‘The Devil Wears Prada’
item.description: The 2006 film is said to be loosely inspired by Wintour and her role as Vogue editor-in-chief.

item.title: Anne Hathaway Shares First Look at ‘The Devil Wears Prada 2’
item.description: “Andy Sachs 2025,” the actress teased as she shared a photo of herself in character on the set of the upcoming sequel.
